name: USPublicHealthMessageTypes
title: US Public Health Message Types
publisher: HL7 International - Public Health Work Group
description: The US Public Health Message Types Value Set is a 'starter set' of codes for uniquely identifying messages in MessageHeader instances contained within a reporting bundle.

contains.display: Indicates a message containing a report exchanged between clinical care and PHA/Research Organization.
Indicates a message containing cancer reporting data sent from clinical care to PHA.
Indicates a message containing cancer report response data sent from PHA to clinical care.
Indicates a message containing Hep C data sent from clinical care to PHA.
Hep C Response Message sent from PHA to clinical care.
Indicates a message containing healthcare survey data sent from clinical care to PHA.
Indicates a message containing healthcare survey data sent from PHA to clinical care.
Indicates a message containing healthcare data sent from clinical care to Research Organization.
Indicates a message containing response data from Research Organization to clinical care.
Indicates a message containing electronic case report healthcare data sent from clinical care.
Indicates a message containing reportability response data in response to an electronic case report.
